# pydomywork

Have to write too many assignments by hand but not have enough time or too lazy to do it, try this library of Python.

## Installation

```bash
pip install pydomywork
```

## Usage

```python
import pydomywork as py

py.convert_text(string)#Will convert the string to handwritten characters.

py.img_to_handtxt(path)#Will extract the texts from the image in the given path and convert it to handwritten characters.

py.feedback()#Developer contact information.

```
